Name: EB002 - email to the customer in MEMO if form escalates
Output_template:
{"subject":"{process_name} form has escalated","fromName":"{NoReplyEmail_N} ","from":"{NoReplyEmail}","recipients_to":"{emailAddress}","recipients_cc":"","recipients_bcc":"","pdf_attachments":"","body":"
Dear {fullName},

Your {process_name} form, reference {case_ref} has escalated to {manager2Email}.

Reason: not approved within 10 working days.

Yours sincerely,

Portsmouth City Council

","attachments":""}
